room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Southern Escape Room in Monroe (LA)
room_description: The mystery continues at Marlsgate Mansion and the death of Mr. P. Boddy is still under investigation. The police are holding all the guests for questioning and searching the entire house for the murder weapon. Will the mystery of who killed Mr. Boddy be solved or does the story go deeper than the roots of the family tree?
